title: when trying to log in says unable to connect and checked the support page doesnt work plzz help
body: i checked the server it was all good then the guide thingy and the website didnt work. Closed league the tried again after a few seconds says unable to log u in because u may be offline btw i live in autralia

replies.body:
I have been summoned! {{summoner:31}} 

It almost sounds like something might be blocking your network from being able to access Riot's servers for some weird reason. Let's make sure to check some of your firewall and [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back up if that doesn't help too much!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FPUNz5yE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-21T03:22:44.696+0000)
>
> It sounds like there could be something blocking the repair tool from running. Just to be safe, I'd like to have you reinstall the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and then run it from the install directory as admin. Doing that should make sure that it did install correctly, and that it has the ability to run without being denied permission by your OS.

Lets try this and head over to the [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if that works. If it doesn't then submit a support ticket.
ran the repair tool but after a minute or 2 it said repair failed
i clicked on the link and it said site can't be reached i tried it on my phone and that didnt work so idk what to do

Heya Hooded,

That seems quite odd, but lets see if we can fix it. The [Network Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) here might help fix it. Go ahead and run the hextech repair tool if the troubleshooting steps do not fix it.
